meanings.definition: The act of creating a raised design or pattern on a surface.
meanings.sent1: The embossment on the paper made the design stand out.
meanings.sent2: The embossment on the leather bag added a touch of elegance.
meanings.sent3: The embossment on the cake looked so real that someone tried to touch it.
meanings.sent4: Her smile left an embossment of joy on everyone's hearts.
meanings.sent5: The embossment of the logo on the sign was so clear, even from a distance.
